{{aside (page="wiki/syntax index")}}

Created underlined text.

Place two underscores at the beginning and end of the text you want to underline.
Note, as web pages often use underlining to indicate a link, underlining is very rarely used.

== Example ==

In __1066__ the Battle of __Hastings__ took place.

{{{
In __1066__ the Battle of __Hastings__ took place.
}}}
